DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective observational study will assess the incidence of hemoglobin cycling in chronic kidney disease (stage 3, 4, and 5) patients with renal anemia treated with Mircera (methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta). Data will be collected from each patient from a 9-month treatment period.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of MIRCERA for the Intrapetient Variability of Hemoglobin Levels in Patients With Chronic Renal Anemia (RIVAL)
DOC.criteria: Adult patients, >/= 18 years of age Chronic kidney disease in predialysis (stage 3 and 4) and dialysis Renal anemia treated with Mircera according to label for at least 9 months before date of signed informed consent Participation in an interventional clinical trial within the retrospective observation period Contraindications to Mircera administration as per label or judged by the investigator
